title: Emil Bock Apocalypse of John Chapter X The Fall of Babylon
description: The four horseman gather for our latest installment on Emil Bock's Apocalypse of John  This time we deal with chapter 10 on the Fall of Babylon and the symbolism of the Whore and the Bride.
